remarks: The composition of a function which maps the zero of the range of a finitely supported function to the zero of its range with this finitely supported function is finitely supported.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
fsuppcor.0 $e |- ( ph -> .0. e. W ) $.
fsuppcor.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
fsuppcor.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) $.
fsuppcor.g $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> D ) $.
fsuppcor.s $e |- ( ph -> C C_ B ) $.
fsuppcor.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. U ) $.
fsuppcor.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
fsuppcor.n $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp Z ) $.
fsuppcor.i $e |- ( ph -> ( G ` Z ) = .0. ) $.
fsuppcor $p |- ( ph -> ( G o. F ) finSupp .0. ) $.
